headline: FTV Q1 Earnings Call: Tariffs, Segment Divergence, and Leadership Transition Shape Outlook
summary: Industrial technology company Fortive (NYSE:FTV) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales falling 3.3% year on year to $1.47 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.85 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Fortive Corporation: A Middle Path Lies Ahead (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Fortive Corporation's short-term growth faces challenges due to weak industry drivers, geopolitical uncertainty, and policy changes, prompting a downgrade...
